attributes.text: This class stores the information needed to instruct a running test to wait. It is thrown as an exception to be caught by the method executing the test.
The amount of time in milliseconds to wait
The function to run after the timeout has expired.

Returns the (computed) value of the property deferredFunction.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #deferredFunction}.
(Computed) value of deferredFunction.

Returns the (computed) value of the property delay.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #delay}.
(Computed) value of delay.
Initial value for property deferredFunction.

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property deferredFunction with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #deferredFunction}.
the default value
Initial value for property delay.

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property delay with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #delay}.
the default value

Resets the user value of the property deferredFunction.

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depeneding on the property configuration and value availability.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #deferredFunction}.

Resets the user value of the property delay.

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depeneding on the property configuration and value availability.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #delay}.
New value for property deferredFunction.

Sets the user value of the property deferredFunction.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #deferredFunction}.
The unmodified incoming value.
New value for property delay.

Sets the user value of the property delay.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #delay}.
The unmodified incoming value.
The function to run after the timeout has expired
The amount of time in milliseconds to wait
